Queensland conservationists call for river-mining ban to protect Great Barrier Reef - The “archaic” practice of mining rivers in here is making a mockery of Australia’s key policy to protect the Great Barrier Reef, wasting multimillion-dollar efforts to cut runoff pollution, opponents say.
